targets.query: SELECT median("to_process") FROM "cookie_jar_status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("value") FROM "still_to_enrich" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last("value") FROM "processing" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last("value") FROM "get_next_for_processing" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(previous)

SELECT "started_at" AS "Started at", "updates_since" AS "Updates since", "retrieval_duration" AS "Retrieval duration (s)", "number_of_updates" AS "Number of updates", "most_recent_update" AS "Most Recent Update" FROM "retrieval" WHERE $timeFilter ORDER BY DESC
SELECT mean("number_of_updates") FROM "retrieval" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Number of updates retrieved from iRODS

targets.query: SELECT mean("retrieval_duration") FROM "retrieval" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Time taken to retrieve and parse updates from iRODS

targets.query: SELECT median("value") FROM "number_of_threads" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
